ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Always best to have a stick.
ItemTooltips.bottle: Super handy to have since you're going to be spamming spells and taking some damage.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: If you're able to harass a fair amount but are running out of mana, pick up the Sage's mask for this before your boots, and finish it afterwards.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Nice mana regen, plus disabling utility.
ItemTooltips.assault: If you're getting nicely fed but still take uncomfortable amounts of damage, get this.
ItemTooltips.bloodstone: For the Earth Spirit who knows no limits.
ItemTooltips.soul_ring: If you find yourself with an overabundance of health and never enough mana, pick this up after your arcane boots.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Gotta get these ASAP for that mana.
ItemTooltips.veil_of_discord: Drop this on people right before you surround them with remnants and ult, it's beautiful.
